subject: p16772702
History: Evaluation of the patient with congestive heart failure and hemodialysis.
Findings: AP chest radiograph was reviewed. As compared to the prior study, there is substantial improvement up to almost complete resolution of severe pulmonary edema. Still present small bilateral pleural effusions are noted, left more than right. Questionable infectious process in the left lower lobe potentially can be suspected, followup with chest radiograph is recommended to establish complete resolution of this still present asymmetric left lower lobe opacity.
